com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile

Class GraphHeapSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.GraphHeapSpace

  • public class GraphHeapSpace
extends Object
    A GraphHeapSpace represents heap file data organized into meaningful categories - thinking of it like a folder for a graph and sub-folders inside for all schemas of the graph into which block heap data (heap pages) and index data are put

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String GRAPH_HEAP_META_DATA_FILE 
      protected ReentrantLock graphHeapLock

      Construct a new GraphHeapSpace instance by specifying name and id of a graph

      Adds a SchemaIndex for a specified schema to the current graph heap space

      Adds a SchemaDataHeap representing secondary data heap for a specified schema to the current graph heap space
      void close()
      Closes a graph heap space, meaning to close all heap files and index file resources for its schemas

      Constructs data schema data structures used to contain heap data in a structural way

      Creates a SchemaDataHeap instance for specified GraphSchema instance

      void createSchemaIndices(GraphSchema schema, List<GraphIndex> indexList)
      Creates non-primary indices for specified GraphSchema instance.
      The method accepts a list of GraphIndex, checks each GraphIndex inside, and creates index data files in case any one of the index is applicable for the specified GraphSchema

      Creates a SchemaIndex instance for specified GraphSchema instance

      Creates a SchemaPropertiesHeap instance for specified GraphSchema instance

      Decrements number of (primary) data tuples by one for a specified schema
      void drop()
      Drops a graph heap space, meaning to drops and deletes all heap files and index file resources for its schemas

      Generates a new element id for specified schema

      Returns id of the graph to which the GraphHeapSpace instance connects

      Returns graph name

        edgeSchemaNames - an array of edge schema names

      • readData

        public void readData()
        Reads graph heap space meta data from disk

        File layout Integer - 4B: file version 4B: next schema id Loop for each schema specified by its schema-id byte: schema data structure is null or not long: next element id long: num of pages long: num of total tuples

      • writeData

        public void writeData()
        Writes graph heap space meta data to file

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes a graph heap space, meaning to close all heap files and index file resources for its schemas

      • drop

        public void drop()
        Drops a graph heap space, meaning to drops and deletes all heap files and index file resources for its schemas

      • sync

        public void sync()
        Writes and force synchronizes graph heap space meta data to file
